tool.name: View Cluster_Peaks
tool.command: Rscript $__tool_directory__/w4mclstrpeakpics_wrapper.R data_matrix_path '$dataMatrix_in' variable_metadata_path '$variableMetadata_in' sample_metadata_path '$sampleMetadata_in' sample_selector_column_name '$sampleSelectorColumnName' sample_selector_value '$sampleSelectorValue' output_pdf '$outputFigure' output_tsv '$outputTable' output_rdata '$outputRdata' r_package_archive $__tool_directory__/w4mclstrpeakpics_0.98.1.tar.gz ; echo exit code $?

param.name: dataMatrix_in
param.label: Data matrix file
param.help: variable x sample, decimal: '.', missing: NA, mode: numerical, separator: tab

param.name: sampleMetadata_in
param.label: Sample metadata file
param.help: sample x metadata columns, separator: tab

param.name: variableMetadata_in
param.label: Variable metadata file
param.help: variable x metadata columns, separator: tab

param.name: sampleSelectorColumnName
param.label: Selector-column name
param.help: Name of column containing selector values.

param.name: sampleSelectorValue
param.label: Selector value
param.help: Value to match in sample-selector column.
